name: DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES v. STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION, et al. Appeal of DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES and Daniel A. and Michael Lieberman
name_abbreviation: Dynamic Student Services v. State System of Higher Education

judges: Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
NIX, Former C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
parties: DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES v. STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION, et al. Appeal of DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES and Daniel A. and Michael Lieberman.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 15th day of January, 1997, the Motion to Dismiss for Mootness is hereby GRANTED.
NIX, Former C.J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: John S. Carnes, Jr., for DSS, et al.
Wayne M. Richardson, Harrisburg, Wayne Melnick, Millersville, for SSHE.
casebody.head_matter:
DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES v. STATE SYSTEM OF HIGHER EDUCATION, et al. Appeal of DYNAMIC STUDENT SERVICES and Daniel A. and Michael Lieberman.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued April 29, 1996.
Decided Jan. 15, 1997.
John S. Carnes, Jr., for DSS, et al.
Wayne M. Richardson, Harrisburg, Wayne Melnick, Millersville, for SSHE.
Before FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
